articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Cops search Mohammed Zubair's B'lauru house for 5 hours
articles.description: A team of Delhi Police came to Bengaluru on Thursday with fact-checker Mohammed Zubair, arrested in a 2018 tweet case, and took him to his residence in east Benglauru for conducting a spot mahajar.

articles.author: Chethan Kumar
articles.title: Karnataka's Covid toll set to top 71,000 on compensation claims
articles.description: Karnataka's official Covid-19 death count is 40,075 as of June 29, and additional deaths continue to be added from the districts that are yet to reflect in the health department's official records. The state's Covid toll is likely to top 71,000, according to …

articles.author: Richa Pinto
articles.title: At 163mm, city sees season's 1st heavy rainfall on last June day
articles.description: June ended on a rainy note-for the first time this monsoon-with consistent showers. In the 12 hours ended 8.30pm on Thursday, the Indian Meteorological Department's Colaba and Santacruz observatories recorded rainfall in triple digits-163mm and 105mm, respect…
